name: International Council on Clean Transportation
memberOrga: The ICCT works with a number of stakeholders, but does not have a membership. Below, we check the boxes for the countries where we have the strongest relationships with key transportation stakeholders.
goal: The mission of the ICCT is to dramatically improve the environmental performance and efficiency of cars, trucks, buses, and transportation systems in order to protect and improve public health, the environment and quality of life.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Public Health, Research and Technology, Transport
euInitiatives: Light- and heavy-duty CO2 regulation, Real-Driving Emissions, Fuel regulation
